text: @realDonaldTrump Yes, you and you alone have little doubt. BTW, there's little doubt your favorite drug doesn't do anything: https://t.co/gmNbRhRQiz   If I were you, I would plan to go back full time into the entertainment industry.  That's where you actually showed some talent.
